feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.6.18
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: missing responsive design in org members page by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17495
  • fix: broken social media preview and title by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17504
  • feat: Salesforce - on booking write to fields on person record [CAL-4575] by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17477
  • fix: disable all emails modal crash on platform by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17485
  • feat: team availability - vertical selector and align times by @itsalam in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17502
  • fix: routing form: dont disable routing and reporting on mobile and fix mobile layout instead by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17444
  • fix: Don't let the modal close accidentally atleast when loading by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17508
  • chore: Update SettingsLayout.tsx by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17498
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17474
  • fix: copy to clipboard button by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17512
  • feat: Round Robin Skip If contact owner first available slot is more than 2 weeks, round robin as normal [CAL-4651] by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17416
  • fix: Logic fix in Salesforce no-show by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17516
  • chore: Replace prisma actions Credential Repository / SelectedCalendar Repository methods by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17443
  • fix: common schedule toggling incorrectly by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17517
  • fix: saml does not add future members to eventtype by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17522
  • fix: event-type atom tabs controlled by prop by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17480
  • chore: Release v4.6.18 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17521

New Contributors

  • @itsalam made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17502

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.6.17...v4.6.18

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.6.19
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: cache meeting OG images for 1 day by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17525
  • fix: event types atom docs by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17528
  • fix: booker timezone from preference instead of session by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17520
  • feat: reset RR every month by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17472
  • fix: issues in 'updateNewTeamMemberEventTypes' while adding new team member. by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17513
  • chore: add sentry performance tracking api-v2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17519
  • chore: v4.6.19 by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17524

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.6.18...v4.6.19

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.6.20
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: loom iframe for atoms by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17550
  • fix: move team availability search to serverside by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17549
  • feat: api v2 reassign by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17460
  • feat: adds attendee and host names, and guest emails in forwarded params by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17530
  • fix: pass upId to JWT if logging in through SAML by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17566
  • fix: atoms docs by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17556
  • fix: docs loom iframe fixes by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17569
  • chore: v4.6.20 by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17571

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.6.19...v4.6.20

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.6.21
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: incorrect capitalization in company names by @yeskunall in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17573
  • fix: iframe issue for atoms documentation by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17570
  • feat: Delete attribute modal by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17557
  • fix: Routing Form - Small Improvements by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17538
  • fix: Incorrect seat availability count displayed for seated booking by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17548
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17577
  • fix: Users details leak for team booking when the team is private by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17403
  • chore: Routing form - Add submitted_at and Sort entries with latest on top by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17491
  • chore: plain text plugin for Editor by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17134
  • fix: Form link in Reroute Dialog gives 404 for members that aren't admin/owner of team by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17537
  • fix: hidden phone booking field should never need validation by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17564
  • fix: incorrect booking title for diff users by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17448
  • feat: Salesforce RR skip based on a user on a lookup field on an account by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17526
  • chore: Release v4.6.21 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17586

New Contributors

  • @yeskunall made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17573

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.6.20...v4.6.21

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.6.22
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17585
  • fix: avatars are not showing in preview image by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17592
  • feat: add free platform plan by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17581
  • fix: split firstname lastname support, phone support & timezone specific startTime in success redirect params by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17593
  • perf: routing forms loading time by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17518
  • fix: apiv2 updateNewTeamMemberEventTypes silently by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17555
  • chore: Release v4.6.22 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17600

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.6.21...v4.6.22
